sqlMap.select:
select recTime,equipmentId,temperature,humidity from tRecord where (recTime between #alarmStartFrom# and #alarmStartTo#) and equipmentId in ($placeList$)
order by recTime, equipmentId
order by equipmentId, recTime
select temperature,humidity,recTime,equipmentId from tRecord where (recTime between #alarmStartFrom# and #alarmStartTo#) and equipmentId in ($placeList$)

select FORMAT(avg(temperature),2) as temperature, FORMAT(avg(humidity),2) as humidity, equipmentId from tRecord where (recTime between #alarmStartFrom# and #alarmStartTo#) and equipmentId in ($placeList$) group by equipmentId

select min(temperature) as temperature, min(humidity) as humidity, equipmentId from tRecord where (recTime between #alarmStartFrom# and #alarmStartTo#) and equipmentId in ($placeList$) group by equipmentId

select max(temperature) as temperature, max(humidity) as humidity, equipmentId from tRecord where (recTime between #alarmStartFrom# and #alarmStartTo#) and equipmentId in ($placeList$) group by equipmentId
sqlMap.update: update tRecord set temperature = #temperature#, humidity = #humidity# where recTime = #recTime#
